Title: Call of the Plains
Description:
<Roki drops a message into your hand.>

$n, Clan Aylaag has heard tales of your great deeds. We invite you to meet our clan and share our ways.

Hadari Khan
ObjectivesText: Speak to Hadari Khan in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
RewardText: Your aid is welcome, Dragonrider. There is much to be done around our camp.
